mil7.7.7:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil7.7.7:0.2_0: The account of the fault-finding mind
mil7.7.7:1.1_0: “Are you able to encourage three things that should be cultivated?”
mil7.7.7:1.2_0: “Great king, the jewel kind of jewels is impure;
mil7.7.7:1.3_0: In the same way, a cow is impure in livelihood.
mil7.7.7:2.1_0: Furthermore, a jewel-treasure doesn’t sin any kind of jewel.
mil7.7.7:2.2_0: In the same way, a bad person you behave like a bad reputation, not with bad friends,
mil7.7.7:3.1_0: Furthermore, a jewel-treasure leads to birth.
mil7.7.7:3.2_0: In the same way, a disciple of a lion who stays in the company of the supreme neces, where they meditate with a rice-span, fruit-return, non-staple food, depressed with gold, silver, and money, and grains to enjoy the fruits of stream-entry.
mil7.7.7:3.4_0: When the Buddha has spoken, gods,
